sentences.en: " Is that stile a rock. You couldn't make it wobble if you tried. "
sentences.cn: “ 那座台阶牢靠吗?” “ 坚如磐石,如果你推一下试试,不会让它动荡一下的. ”

sentences.en: " My stile of writing is very different from yours. "
sentences.cn: “ 我写信的风格和你很不同. ”

sentences.en: A: We put tokens in this slot and push the turn _ stile, right?
sentences.cn: 我们将代币投入这个孔,然后推这个十字转门, 对 吗 ?

sentences.en: Another difference is about stile other style.
sentences.cn: 另一不同之处就是写作风格.

sentences.en: At the far end of the meadow two slates in the wall, which at this point replaced the hedge, indicated a stile.
sentences.cn: 在草地的另一端, 树篱围墙中有两块石板和树篱相连.看得出这是供人越过树篱的阶梯.

sentences.en: He knew he was within five steps of the stile leading into Widow Douglas'grounds.
sentences.cn: 现在他在离道格拉斯寡妇家庭院的阶梯口不到五步远的地方.

sentences.en: He paused to give Alexandra his hand as she stepped over the stile.
sentences.cn: 他停了下来,伸手帮亚历山德拉越过门槛.

sentences.en: Help a lame dog over a stile.
sentences.cn: 帮助跛足的狗越过栅栏.

sentences.en: Help a lame dog over stile.
sentences.cn: 帮助跛足的狗越过栅门.

sentences.en: Help the dog over the stile.
It was good of him to help a lame dog over a stile.
sentences.cn: 他真好,帮助人渡过了难关.

sentences.en: Please help me over the stile.
The dog jumped over the stile.
The famous old plan of counting sheep jumping over a stile has never served my turn.
sentences.cn: 那个有名的数跳过篱笆墙台阶的山羊的老办法对我从来都不起作用.

sentences.en: Vaulting the stile, he headed diagonally across the paddock.
sentences.cn: 翻身跃过栅栏后，他便朝斜穿围场的方向走去。

trans.tran_cn: 墙（或篱的）两侧的阶梯（供人畜通行用）
trans.tran_en: a set of steps that helps people climb over a fence in the countryside
